Receptionist Job at African Industries Group




        
    

        
        African Industries Group (AIG) is a diversified global conglomerate with a legacy of 52 years of business excellence and sustainable growth. It is headquartered in Lagos, Nigeria. It has been contributing to Nigeria’s socio-economic growth and industrial development and is equally committed towards the nurturing and development of the local community.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Receptionist
Job Location: Lekki, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Key Responsibilities
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Greet and welcome visitors in a warm, professional manner.
	Answer and direct phone calls promptly.
	Manage incoming/outgoing mail and deliveries.
	Maintain reception area cleanliness and organization.
	Assist with scheduling, bookings, and administrative tasks.
	Provide general support to staff and management.


Requirements


	Candidates should possess relevant qualifications.
	Previous experience in a receptionist or administrative role.
	Excellent communication and customer-service skills.
	Professional appearance and positive attitude.
	Strong organizational and multitasking abilities.
	Proficiency in MS Office (Word, Outlook, Excel).
	Ability to handle a busy front desk environment.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send a copy of their updated CV / Resume to: Jamal.ogidan@africanindustries.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Social Media Officer",
  "description": "Tribest is a corporate support solutions provider with a comprehensive range of people outsourcing services. We have a diversified team of management, strategy, banking and capacity development experts working together to provide organizations with the best human resource management solutions. With a team that diverse, we are setting new standards of performance and raising the bar in excellent service delivery.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Social Media Officer
Job Location:&nbsp;Port Harcourt, Rivers
Employment Type: Full-time

Key Responsibilities


	Content Strategy and Execution:
	
		Content Calendar: Develop, manage, and maintain a daily and weekly content calendar across all platforms (e.g., Instagram, Twitter/X, LinkedIn, Facebook, TikTok).
		Creation: Produce compelling and original content, including written posts, graphic design concepts, short videos, stories, and live broadcasts, tailored for each platform.
		Brand Voice: Ensure all social media communication maintains a consistent and professional brand voice, tone, and visual identity.
		Campaign Management: Plan and execute social media campaigns to promote new products, services, events, or brand initiatives, coordinating with the Marketing team.
	
	
	Community Engagement and Moderation:
	
		Daily Monitoring: Monitor all social media channels, listen for brand mentions, and track relevant industry conversations.
		Interaction: Respond promptly, professionally, and creatively to comments, messages, and mentions to foster a positive community and manage reputation.
		Customer Service: Triage customer service inquiries received via social media and efficiently escalate them to the appropriate internal departments for resolution.
		Crisis Management: Monitor for potential crises or negative feedback and implement approved social media response strategies to mitigate reputational damage.
	
	
	Analytics, Reporting, and Optimization:
	
		Performance Tracking: Utilize social media analytics tools (e.g., Facebook Insights, Google Analytics) to track key performance indicators (KPIs) such such as reach, engagement rate, click-through rate (CTR), and conversion rates.
		Reporting: Prepare and present comprehensive weekly and monthly performance reports to management, providing insights and actionable recommendations for improvement.
		A/B Testing: Conduct A/B testing on content formats, posting times, and calls-to-action to continuously optimize performance.
		Benchmarking: Monitor and report on competitor social media activity to identify best practices and market opportunities.
	
	
	Trend Awareness and Technology:
	
		Platform Expertise: Stay current with the latest social media trends, platform updates (e.g., new features on Instagram Reels, TikTok best practices), and algorithm changes.
		Tool Utilization: Efficiently use graphic design tools (e.g., Canva, Adobe Creative Suite), video editing software, and scheduling/management platforms (e.g., Buffer, Hootsuite).
	
	


Required Qualifications &amp; Requirements


	Education: Bachelor&rsquo;s Degree in Marketing, Communications, Journalism, Digital Media, or a related field.
	Experience: 2 - 3 years of proven experience managing corporate or commercial social media accounts (not personal accounts).
	Technical Skills: High proficiency in major social media platforms (Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, TikTok, Twitter/X).
	Creative Aptitude: Demonstrated ability to create compelling visual content and write engaging copy under tight deadlines.
	Analytical Skills: Strong ability to interpret data, generate insights from social media metrics, and use that information to drive strategy.
	Communication: Excellent written and verbal communication skills, with a professional and friendly demeanor for community engagement.

With a team that diverse, we are setting new standards of performance and raising the bar in excellent service delivery.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Social Media Officer
Job Location: Port Harcourt, Rivers
Employment Type: Full-time

Key Responsibilities

	Content Strategy and Execution:
	
		Content Calendar: Develop, manage, and maintain a daily and weekly content calendar across all platforms (e.g., Instagram, Twitter/X, LinkedIn, Facebook, TikTok).
		Creation: Produce compelling and original content, including written posts, graphic design concepts, short videos, stories, and live broadcasts, tailored for each platform.
		Brand Voice: Ensure all social media communication maintains a consistent and professional brand voice, tone, and visual identity.
		Campaign Management: Plan and execute social media campaigns to promote new products, services, events, or brand initiatives, coordinating with the Marketing team.
	
	
	Community Engagement and Moderation:
	
		Daily Monitoring: Monitor all social media channels, listen for brand mentions, and track relevant industry conversations.
		Interaction: Respond promptly, professionally, and creatively to comments, messages, and mentions to foster a positive community and manage reputation.
		Customer Service: Triage customer service inquiries received via social media and efficiently escalate them to the appropriate internal departments for resolution.
		Crisis Management: Monitor for potential crises or negative feedback and implement approved social media response strategies to mitigate reputational damage.
	
	
	Analytics, Reporting, and Optimization:
	
		Performance Tracking: Utilize social media analytics tools (e.g., Facebook Insights, Google Analytics) to track key performance indicators (KPIs) such such as reach, engagement rate, click-through rate (CTR), and conversion rates.
		Reporting: Prepare and present comprehensive weekly and monthly performance reports to management, providing insights and actionable recommendations for improvement.
		A/B Testing: Conduct A/B testing on content formats, posting times, and calls-to-action to continuously optimize performance.
		Benchmarking: Monitor and report on competitor social media activity to identify best practices and market opportunities.
	
	
	Trend Awareness and Technology:
	
		Platform Expertise: Stay current with the latest social media trends, platform updates (e.g., new features on Instagram Reels, TikTok best practices), and algorithm changes.
		Tool Utilization: Efficiently use graphic design tools (e.g., Canva, Adobe Creative Suite), video editing software, and scheduling/management platforms (e.g., Buffer, Hootsuite).
	
	


Required Qualifications & Requirements


	Education: Bachelor’s Degree in Marketing, Communications, Journalism, Digital Media, or a related field.
	Experience: 2 - 3 years of proven experience managing corporate or commercial social media accounts (not personal accounts).
	Technical Skills: High proficiency in major social media platforms (Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, TikTok, Twitter/X).
	Creative Aptitude: Demonstrated ability to create compelling visual content and write engaging copy under tight deadlines.
	Analytical Skills: Strong ability to interpret data, generate insights from social media metrics, and use that information to drive strategy.
	Communication: Excellent written and verbal communication skills, with a professional and friendly demeanor for community engagement.

Lithium-Ion Battery System Expertise:


	Perform assembly and disassembly of lithium-ion battery packs, modules, and cells following safety and manufacturer guidelines.
	Troubleshoot and repair issues related to:
	Battery Management Systems (BMS)
	Thermal management components


Charging systems:


	Cell balancing and protection circuits
	Voltage irregularities, capacity loss, and internal resistance problems
	Conduct diagnostic testing, including voltage checks, capacity tests, impedance testing, and fault isolation.

	Power distribution panels

	Refrigeration units, lighting systems, and sensors
	Backup energy systems (solar, inverters, and generators if applicable)

	Experience using multimeters, load testers, oscilloscopes, torque tools, and other diagnostic equipment.
	Understanding of battery chemistry, lifecycle behavior, and failure modes.
	Knowledge of safety protocols for high-voltage and energy storage systems.


Salary
N200,000 monthly.

Restaurant Female Cashier Job at A27 Global Services Limited




        
    

        
        A27 Global Services Limited is a professional recruitment and career development company. We specialize in connecting job seekers with the right opportunities while equipping them with the tools to succeed in today’s competitive job market.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Restaurant Female Cashier
Job Location: Ajah - Badore, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Working Days: Monday – Sunday
Day Off: 1 day off per week
Age Requirement: 25 years and above

Job Summary
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	The Female Restaurant Cashier will be responsible for managing all cash transactions, providing excellent customer service, issuing receipts, and ensuring accurate record-keeping.
	She will serve as the first point of contact for customers making payments and must maintain a friendly and professional attitude.


Key Responsibilities


	Handle customer payments efficiently (cash, POS, transfers).
	Issue receipts and maintain accurate transaction records.
	Balance the cash drawer at the beginning and end of each shift.
	Assist customers with inquiries and provide excellent customer service.
	Maintain a clean and organized cashier workstation.
	Report any discrepancies, machine faults, or customer issues to management.
	Follow all restaurant policies and financial procedures.
	Support front-of-house operations when required.


Requirements


	Female candidate, 25 years and above.
	Previous experience as a cashier, customer service staff, or related role (preferably in a restaurant).
	Good communication and interpersonal skills.
	Ability to work under pressure and multitask.
	Basic mathematics and record-keeping skills.
	Familiarity with POS terminals and payment reconciliation.
	Polite, trustworthy, and customer-focused.


Salary


	N90,000 per month. 


Benefits:


	Accommodation provided, Feeding provided.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: hrconsultant377@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Note: For more information Send a direct WhatsApp message to 09037857849.
